title: Do I really deserve a chat ban?
body:
I haven't had chat bans in years, I stopped being toxic however recently I've got them twice. I also know a couple other people who got them who had never had them before, weren't toxic people and weren't flaming those games. My question is, has the system suddenly got a hell of a lot more strict? If so, why weren't players notified of this? Never have I see a post saying "this is what is considered toxic", which I think should be advertised if this is how strict they're going to be. Not once did I insult anyone this game, and I was continuously positive towards the non-toxic team members. 

With my chat bans, I was playing Ahri mid. Throughout the game I was constructively communicating with my teammates, all except for an Urgot top, who was constantly flaming me throughout the game because I chose to help bot instead of top.

Side notes: 
Ignore the first couple messages, I was joking around with a premade.
When I said "aHrI yOu ArE nOoB" I was quoting Urgot when he called me a noob, right after i got a triple kill or something.
Throughout the WHOLE game, including post-game where he said he was going to report me, this guy was saying I was trolling, calling me a noob, saying I was trash etc. I think at one point he started insulting my personal life too, but I don't remember 100%.

I got chat bans for this:

Pre-Game
PartyWolfGaming: Relatable name
PartyWolfGaming: The amount of times ive died just to get a ward
PartyWolfGaming: this damn ward scoring system is deadly
PartyWolfGaming: ner wards
PartyWolfGaming: nerf*
In-Game
PartyWolfGaming: yeah his bollocks stink atm
PartyWolfGaming: can smell them from across the room
PartyWolfGaming: sweaty league
PartyWolfGaming: i pinged it
PartyWolfGaming: wtf
PartyWolfGaming: dude
PartyWolfGaming: i was pushed up with a massive wavbe
PartyWolfGaming: wave
PartyWolfGaming: im not missing on 2 levels to help your suicide mission
PartyWolfGaming: wp bot
PartyWolfGaming: i will help when i can bot
PartyWolfGaming: 0/2
PartyWolfGaming: "aHrI yOu ArE nOoB"
PartyWolfGaming: i ss
PartyWolfGaming: that should be enough
PartyWolfGaming: i was on my way top
PartyWolfGaming: but first i defended my tower
PartyWolfGaming: stop questioning my judgement when you are feeding
PartyWolfGaming: vi top
PartyWolfGaming: ty jinx <3
PartyWolfGaming: what
PartyWolfGaming: i was pinging you to tell you corki was coming
PartyWolfGaming: youre welcome kiddo
PartyWolfGaming: why
PartyWolfGaming: meh
PartyWolfGaming: bad call
PartyWolfGaming: mb
PartyWolfGaming: ?
PartyWolfGaming: i said mb
PartyWolfGaming: and i said mb
PartyWolfGaming: i know it was stupid
PartyWolfGaming: thats why i said mb
PartyWolfGaming: why do you have a problem with me
PartyWolfGaming: then chill out
PartyWolfGaming: 2/5
PartyWolfGaming: wp
PartyWolfGaming: hahahhaah
PartyWolfGaming: the 3/7 suicidal urgot is calling the 15/1/8 "trash" constantly hahahaha
PartyWolfGaming: then why am i 15/1/10 and you are feeding hahahaha
PartyWolfGaming: gg wp
PartyWolfGaming: report urgot for flame please
Post-Game
PartyWolfGaming: 16/1/12 and only S- :C
PartyWolfGaming: haha please do urgot
PartyWolfGaming: nice to see you get banned :)
PartyWolfGaming: silver 3 tbh
PartyWolfGaming: not far off you kiddo
PartyWolfGaming: 3/7
PartyWolfGaming: 10K more damage than you
PartyWolfGaming: i carried your arse :*
PartyWolfGaming: xdxd
PartyWolfGaming: u feed all game
PartyWolfGaming: this is so funny
PartyWolfGaming: hahaha


Please tell me if the system has changed and if I deserve chat bans and if so, why.
Much appreciated :)

replies.body: What in the world is happening with some of these posts that get up and/or downvoted 20 times in 30 seconds?
Mafia?
I second that vote.
Yakuza
I think there's a new upvote site or something.

Saying in /all chat to report someone is considered report-griefing/inciteful actions. You really do need to be more civil with the playerbase or you’ll get much worse than a chat restriction.

I’m incredibly curious how you got so many upvotes though...

Just because you bring a reddit upvoting flash mob/stream followers does not mean that it does anything. You had it pre planned with people to come onto the boards and upvote.

That said, that looks quite similar to my chat restrict over a year ago. The problem is that you CONTINUED to talk to the urgot and there was mild flame in there too. That chat log looks like it is about 20 mins worthish at least and almost half of your commentaries were... although fairly low key.... flaming the urgot.

What most likely happened is that along with this game.... you had multiple games along this line of mild flame that was not punishable by itself.... but still made a tick on your account. Like a slow drip into a bucket. Eventually the bucket overflows and then this happens.

My suggestion is just mute flamers, there really isnt any need to talk to them. Then it also keeps you from getting in trouble.

"Just because you bring a reddit upvoting flash mob/stream followers does not mean that it does anything. You had it pre planned with people to come onto the boards and upvote."

Took me a few minutes to maybe understand this, if you're saying I got upvotes however so then you're incorrect. It's actually my first time posting on LoL forums, and i don't post on reddit/know how to get upvotes. I came back on the thread after 2 hours and only saw i had 11 upvotes because of people commenting on the upvotes.

I am so sorry if I've completely misunderstood you and made a dick of myself hahaha.

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-04-11T23:59:56.075+0000)
>
> "Just because you bring a reddit upvoting flash mob/stream followers does not mean that it does anything. You had it pre planned with people to come onto the boards and upvote."
> 
> Took me a few minutes to maybe understand this, if you're saying I got upvotes however so then you're incorrect. It's actually my first time posting on LoL forums, and i don't post on reddit/know how to get upvotes. I came back on the thread after 2 hours and only saw i had 11 upvotes because of people commenting on the upvotes.
> 
> I am so sorry if I've completely misunderstood you and made a dick of myself hahaha.

No, the forums don't upvote threads that have _these_ chat logs. Been around for a while here, and the only time I see it is when there's upvote manipulation. 

>Took me a few minutes to understand that. It took you a few minutes 'maybe' to understand.... _that_? 

No.

>I don't know how to get upvotes. 

Right? 

>I am so sorry if I've completely misunderstood you and made a dick of myself hahaha. 

Woah, turned very polite there at the end. 

Keep at it. It works when you **ACTUALLY** _are_ both in-game with the actions to prove it and on the forums. 

Can you guess which you lack though?

Ding-Ding-Ding! 

The actions in-game.

And actually, sorta the ones on the forums, too.....

Not at one point was I being rude to you, I was simply answering your post. It's you who's being rude now. I didn't bring a "mob" or whatever you've called it to upvote my post. If you look now infact I've got -30. I didn't know the forums was so active tbh. And you're right, getting upvotes wouldn't do anything for me so why would I bother?
Thank you and move on. ^^

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-12T14:49:51.798+0000)
>
> Not at one point was I being rude to you, I was simply answering your post. It's you who's being rude now. I didn't bring a "mob" or whatever you've called it to upvote my post. If you look now infact I've got -30. I didn't know the forums was so active tbh. And you're right, getting upvotes wouldn't do anything for me so why would I bother?
> Thank you and move on. ^^
"Not at one point was I being rude to you, I was simply answering your post." 
Not sure what you mean. 

You didn't bring a mob, but you probably used bots for upvotes? It doesn't take a genius to see that. We see it here all the time with ban reports and teenage/man-child twitch streamers. Or maybe a botting folk just thought, "why not" and decided to spam upvote your thread to 23ish in 2ish hours before it being downvoted to -30. If it's as you say, then it's probably the latter and I am sorry.
Apology accepted :)

Calling for reports and pointing out bad kda are considered low level toxicity. If this is a common trend for you, then it's possible you've had reports stack and this game nudged you over the line to be chat restricted.

Though if you're still curious, and if no one else can really bring in a 'definite' answer, you can always submit a support ticket asking about your restriction. They'll be able to point out what exactly snagged you.

You argued with your team and harassed them the entire time. Chat restriction deserved. If you think it was an incorrect punishment and continue to engage in this behavior, you can expect more punishments.
Idk it doesn't LOOK like you were doing anything wrong, but the flamer may have reported you and kicked the auto-system into gear. That is most likely the case.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:58:02.583+0000)
>
> Idk it doesn't LOOK like you were doing anything wrong, but the flamer may have reported you and kicked the auto-system into gear. That is most likely the case.

I'm confused by this.  I thought a report where you weren't toxic wouldn't result in any action.

> [{quoted}](name=kushinshin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2019-04-11T22:34:10.948+0000)
>
> He's a volunteer.  Consider the quality that comes with it.

No need to be disrespectful. I am merely trying to assist Heth. Also if you took the time to read the rest of thread, someone pointed out that if you are reported, key words will be pulled. So maybe try reading in context before making passive aggressive comments about people.
He's angry about having been banned from the boards, if you didn't see his earlier post so he will passive aggressively insult you any time he sees you most likely.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=00020000000100000000,timestamp=2019-04-12T00:14:54.829+0000)
>
> He's angry about having been banned from the boards, if you didn't see his earlier post so he will passive aggressively insult you any time he sees you most likely.

Oh ok. Well hopefully we can remedy our relationship. Thanks for telling me.

> [{quoted}](name=Rowanstar,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2019-04-11T23:35:23.488+0000)
>
> No need to be disrespectful. I am merely trying to assist Heth. Also if you took the time to read the rest of thread, someone pointed out that if you are reported, key words will be pulled. So maybe try reading in context before making passive aggressive comments about people.

I apologize for acting the same way your specialists do.  I forget that only regular board members can be punished for it.

> [{quoted}](name=kushinshin,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=00020000000100000001,timestamp=2019-04-12T01:11:59.902+0000)
>
> I apologize for acting the same way your specialists do.  I forget that only regular board members can be punished for it.

I believe specialists are regular board members who stand out and are not mods. So they may speak up a bit more. I haven't conversed with any so idk but I'm sorry that you feel offended. It's always good to ask a mod to intervene and I'm here to help if you need me.
this is a lie. The system looks for key trigger words and phrases nothing more. It can not detect the context of them.

>The ZTP side of the system looks for key trigger words and phrases nothing more.

There we go.

> [{quoted}](name=iamthegoatofwar,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-04-11T22:33:51.551+0000)
>
> this is a lie. The system looks for key trigger words and phrases nothing more. It can not detect the context of them.

Very possible a suicide statement is reportable. Riot, please acknowledge this post is a reference to OP!
Yeah p sure the "suicidal" triggered it

This is toxic imo. You talk way too much in chat and you were borderline flaming your team multiple times. Just spamming this many messages is toxic imo. I would've muted you instantly and if I had seem some of those specific statements in game, most likely reported you for negativity.

The game was quite long, I wasn't "spamming" at all. I talked the most in post-game. Most of my chat was informing my teammates of enemy positions, saying "gj" and thanking people. The most I talked in game was saying sorry for a bad baron call.

It was a 27 minute game. That isn’t a “long game.” Not counting premand post game chat you averaged roughly a message and a half per minute. You were fed off your ass and stomped the enemy team why do you feel the need to engage an underproforming teammate flaming you.  What validation are you looking for there? Deserved ban or not why? Just mute them and play the game. You literally gain nothing by engaging someone flaming you.

I thought the game was longer, mb.
So what if I was talking in game? There's not a rule against casual talk is there? Throughout pregame and the first 10 minutes or so I was being nothing but positive. The only negative things I said were explaining why I didn't follow up a gank (yes not in the best manner i realise), and when Urgot was personally insulting me I pointed out his kda and told him to stop flaming because it wasn't going to help the team. I agree I should of just muted him, that's where I went wrong.

" I was constructively communicating with my teammates."

You can call it that if you want. 

>Sketchy upvotes
Saying "gj" and "ty" and informing teammates of enemy positions isnt constructively communicating? Understood.

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2019-04-12T14:53:53.946+0000)
>
> Saying "gj" and "ty" and informing teammates of enemy positions isnt constructively communicating? Understood.

1. The way you do it. 
2. The rest of your chat logs.
The way I do it? How can I negatively say "good job" and "thank you".. lol?

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=000d000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-13T00:47:09.145+0000)
>
> The way I do it? How can I negatively say "good job" and "thank you".. lol?

Oops, my bad. Glanced through your chat logs and used my imperfect memory to recall when responding. I assumed. My bad. 

But don't cherry pick. What about the rest of your chat logs?

The rest of my chat logs where I explain why I didn't follow up on a gank (not in the best way), and replying to an Urgot personally insulting me by putting his kda and saying to report him? The reason I posted this was to ask if that's seriously bannable? It just seems really strict and over the top. With mild stuff like this people should at least first get a warning. I didn't realise putting someone's kda and saying to report them was bannable as you see it ALL the time with no repercussions, and never have I seen any rules against it. Not once did I insult any of my teammates.

You harassed someone and made fun of them for being suicidal, how much worse can words get? and over their skill at league of legends no less. Maybe he just had a bad game and got snowballed on, and I'm sure the harassment didn't help him.
 
**You have to remember that you are playing with real people with feelings.** 

We just want to play the game and have a good time and nobody should have to deal with this. Almost anyone will tell you that the shit talking is the worst part of this game and what keeps people from wanting to play.

Don't twist my words, I said the specific gank was suicidal if I was to participate. Please read through before commenting :). 
The only person you could consider I "harassed" was an urgot calling me trash and insulting me, to which I put his kda in chat. That was all. Please consider the context.

Sorry, I didn't pick up on the context because you only posted what you said I guess. But ultimately when somebody is harassing you, harassing them back won't make anything better. just don't stoop to their level, mute them if you have to and report them at the end of the game. sometimes people play bad, you know, just try your best and stay positive. It will help your sanity and enjoyment of the game, and keep you out of trouble. I get it though, I've done plenty of shit talking. I haven't ever gotten in trouble for it but I should have, it's no wonder so many people act like jackasses all the time when you can just get away with it.

technically yes

you were harassing the team (or specifically a few players)

that offense would indeed cause a chat ban (if you were reported for it)

with chat be careful what you say and how much you say

after the first or second instance of the issue, you honestly should have just muted the player(s) in question and left it go

This sort of stuff needs a warning first. IMO there should be a reform card that pops up for like 3 days, but instead of a chat restriction/ban it says "WARNING: Continuing this behavior will lead to a ban" followed by chat logs. This is minor and should not be an instant chat restriction IMHO
I agree, I'm sure Riot used to do that.
My guess is that maybe the word suicidal triggered the system or the person reviewing it.
I like how he is toxic and puts ":*" "hahaha" to taunt more. Plus the score taunt is alone deserving a ban.

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:41:15.002+0000)
>
> When I said "aHrI yOu ArE nOoB" I was quoting Urgot when he called me a noob, right after i got a triple kill or something.

The algorithm does not consider and cannot determine whether you are quoting someone else. In fact, it doesn't even take other players' chat into account. If someone says something which would result in punishment and you quote it, the IFS will treat both of you exactly the same (assuming both of you were reported). As for what else the IFS saw:

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:41:15.002+0000)
>
> PartyWolfGaming: wtf
> PartyWolfGaming: dude
> PartyWolfGaming: i was pushed up with a massive wavbe
> PartyWolfGaming: wave
> PartyWolfGaming: im not missing on 2 levels to help your suicide mission

Negative attitude for complaining


> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:41:15.002+0000)
>
> PartyWolfGaming: stop questioning my judgement when you are feeding

Insulting another player for doing poorly

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:41:15.002+0000)
> PartyWolfGaming: youre welcome kiddo

I don't think it likes the term "kiddo."

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:41:15.002+0000)
> PartyWolfGaming: the 3/7 suicidal urgot is calling the 15/1/8 "trash" constantly hahahaha
> PartyWolfGaming: then why am i 15/1/10 and you are feeding hahahaha

Again, insulting someone for poor performance


> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:41:15.002+0000)
> PartyWolfGaming: report urgot for flame please

Calling for another player to be reported

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:41:15.002+0000)
> PartyWolfGaming: haha please do urgot
> PartyWolfGaming: nice to see you get banned :)

Taunting the Urgot (won't show the lines, nice bug, boards. it's the second and third lines of post-game chat)

> [{quoted}](name=PartyWolfGaming,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=BAbUYNsb,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-11T21:41:15.002+0000)
> PartyWolfGaming: silver 3 tbh
> PartyWolfGaming: not far off you kiddo
> PartyWolfGaming: 3/7
> PartyWolfGaming: 10K more damage than you
> PartyWolfGaming: i carried your arse :*
> PartyWolfGaming: xdxd
> PartyWolfGaming: u feed all game
> PartyWolfGaming: this is so funny
> PartyWolfGaming: hahaha

Again, insulting a player's performance. Also, insulting their rank.
I understand. Thank you :)

Personally, I don't think so. If we somehow had a way to see what he was saying, that would be able to open this a lot more. I don't see anything toxic, except for the "Ahri you are noob" and yes I know he was quoting/mocking, but people at riot might think differently. If you were both punished, then that would kind of seem fair. The best choice is to just mute him.

If he got the same punishment as me, then it's completely unfair, which if he did get a punishment, it probably would of been the same as me. Someone who was flaming calling me trash saying multiple times to report me and insulting my personal life, doesn't seem equivalent to me .. saying to report him once? Saying a kda? Saying the word "suicidal" which has been took out of context? I'm not even sure what counts as "toxic" anymore.
let me just add a "chat ban" doesnt exist. you get a chat restriction

(Yep you deserve a chat ban for these cause)
 
1st you called your teammate a noob so you made him feel worse about himself.
2nd you complain about defencce and balance in game.
3rd you said (wtf)
4th you understimate someone with a bad game like you are the boss. (thats against the rules)
5th calling for reports.
6th (nice to see you get banned)
7th constantly saying kiddo a teammate.
8th you used caps to insult a teammate.
9th you typed alot instead of focusing and muting.

you broke 9 rules ofc you should get chat restricted lel what did you expect?
